title: Rani Haar Inspired Emerald and Polki Jhumka: A Timeless Treasure
materials: Freshwater Pearls. High Clarity and Excellent Cut Emeralds are used.
features: Intricate Polki Diamond setting arranged in floral and geometric patterns around an inner emerald and further enhanced with emerald drop with hanging pearl. The design embodies the regal spirit of a Rani Haar, adapted for a lighter, wearable Jhumka style. Delicate gold work showcasing traditional South Indian craftsmanship.
colors: and Pearl White. The gold has a warm
occasions: and other grand occasions. Can also elevate a modern Indian ensemble for a festive gathering.
description: This piece is a masterpiece of traditional craftsmanship, featuring authentic Polki diamonds and exquisite Emeralds. The Rani Haar inspiration gives it a royal touch, while the Jhumka style makes it versatile and wearable. The Hyderabadi polish enhances the gold's luster and durability, ensuring this becomes a cherished heirloom piece ( వారసత్వ ఆభరణం).
